website_summaries.verdict: The iPhone X sets the stage for Apple's next decade, with a sharp new design and a future focus on augmented reality.
cons: Apps need to be reprogrammed to take advantage of display

customer_reviews.title: Beware this may be a used phone pretending to be a new one
customer_reviews.text: I would put a zero star rating if allowed. I bought this a gift, only to find that during set up that the iPhone had already been owned by 2 other people with their IDs still hidden in the phone. Apple support that nothing can be done to remove them from the phone without the password for those accounts - clearly that is never going to happen. So I am now going to have to take this gift back and send it back to Amazon. Hardly Christmas. Completely unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: MD007

customer_reviews.title: A solid phone, but an eyewatering price
customer_reviews.text: It's a truly great phone, at a grossly inflated price. You would be foolish if you didn't think a large amount of what you are paying for is branding. Yes - you do get a lot of tech with this. And I find that even though some other phones are technically superior the iPhone seems to run better HOWEVER this is nearly one thousand pounds. That is a big investment - more than a laptop. If you can afford it, it won't disappoint but it's defiantly not that much better than the older versions which are 2/3 of the price.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: It’s a legit unopened I Phone X.
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this I was a bit skeptical due to the reviews. It arrived earlier than expected. It’s a legitimate I Phone X, not a fake or refurbished one. It also comes with headphones and a charger.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Great phone at a decent price.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter and she absolutely loves it. Arrived quickly and although it was a grade A used item, couldn't find a mark on it! 12 month warranty gives peace of mind too.
customer_reviews.author: Wasim

customer_reviews.title: Genuine iPhone x
customer_reviews.text: I received a genuine iPhone X, I was initially worried but on a second thought plus reviews; I decided to go for it. No disappointment, brand new phone and no problem. Amazon called me to verify before authorising my purchase, even more better and more importantly cheap price I could get.
customer_reviews.author: Ritlady

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: supplier is amazing. Received this phone before the due date which was amazing. Phone was brandnew unlocked in it’s original packaging:-) Phone is good but don’t think apple is worth the price tag in what it actually is.
customer_reviews.author: Rustam

customer_reviews.title: Great brand new iPhone !
customer_reviews.text: Really good iPhone ! Arrived way earlier than expected so quite pleased. The phone is brand new and is just amazing !
customer_reviews.author: Karima Mohamed

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: absolute bargain for the iphone 10 also arrived really quickly
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone
customer_reviews.text: Not needing the latest and greatest model, I went for this brand new 2017 iPhone X at a substantial saving over the original price. As an upgrade from an iPhone 8, it is streets ahead. The facial recognition works very well indeed, and the build quality is superb. Photographs are of very high quality. Don't hesitate if you want a still-excellent phone at a much better price than the latest models.
customer_reviews.author: JRF

customer_reviews.title: My Apple was rotten!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my new Apple X phone although got off to a bad start with a phone that none of the cameras were working on it! Hence face recognition would not work. All resolved after a few stern phone calls with Amazon and Amazon & Apple (shop) on our behalf (Apple shop said they had never seen anything like it on a brand new phone before). Rather ruin my Christmas present though 🙁
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: Iphone X at a more acceptable price
customer_reviews.text: Well pleased with my purchase at a more sensible price. The phone was never, in my view, worth the original asking price of £999. But still a excellent phone never the less. It is a brand new unit that so far has proven to be faultless. Delivered in real fast time too. You can find them a little cheaper, but this is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I was most impressed by the condition of this phone - It was truly immaculate! Yes Battery was down to 96% of capacity but it is a used phone and the battery life is still way better than I was used to. Thanks very much! HIghly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: clockmanuk

customer_reviews.title: Over heating
customer_reviews.text: The phone is overheating after a little use. Need to get it looked at because this should not be happening to a £900+ phone.
customer_reviews.author: Muj

customer_reviews.title: iPhone at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with my purchase at a great price. I was a bit sceptical first buying a apple product on amazon but everything went fine and the phone is great
customer_reviews.author: Karin

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Came pretty quickly and in good condition. Didn’t come with earphones for hygiene reasons which is understandable but did have everything else. No problems with the phone so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Quite good
customer_reviews.text: To be honest I bought phones online before, but they wasn’t that good. This one i have it for 2 years, its not getting overheated or crashing at all. Thank you! The battery is lasting at least one day even after 2 years of constant use.
customer_reviews.author: Martin and Deni

customer_reviews.title: G
customer_reviews.text: This is my 6th iPhone and in my opinion is the best yet. It took a little while to get used to using it compared to my iPhone 6s with no home button but comes naturally after a while. Photo quality is great as well and the battery life seems to last much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Revpanther

customer_reviews.title: Love the Phone and a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Best iPhone yet and at a good price, much cheaper than the Apple Store and comes with all the warranties and is new in the box
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Amazing phone
customer_reviews.text: Used it for 2 years now. Great battery life and great display and had no issues at all. The battery backup still lasts it’s original claim and rest of the product is at par with apples claims. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Monson

customer_reviews.title: iPhone x
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the iPhone X its fast it’s camera is really good, I like everything about it
customer_reviews.author: Smiler

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for Christmas. Was a bit skeptical as it was a couple of hundred pounds cheaper than going to Apple. Was brand new, so happy, will always look on Amazon when buying another phone
customer_reviews.author: richard adams

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Have no issues with this product. Product v well saved twice during accidental falls
customer_reviews.author: HC

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: For £600 couldn’t find a better deal. XR was £630 and come in a close second.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: iPhone X
customer_reviews.text: Love my new iPhone X. Went from a iPhone 5s to iPhone X. Picture quality is great. Battery life is brilliant. Can’t fault it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great genuine phone lovely features got on deal price like for Apple products recommended
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect choice.
customer_reviews.text: I always wanted an iPhone X as upgrade from iPhone 7 and this one did perfect. Really liked the display and design of this iPhone. Bigger than the one I had and a better camera.
customer_reviews.author: Farooq

customer_reviews.title: Apple always the best
customer_reviews.text: Simply, one of the best phone. I am really happy overall, worth every single penny. Great screen, battery duration, amazing camera and sound. The space grey colour is elegant, superb the quality of the material used in this iPhone. It is a premium product. Really pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Danilo Cristofalo

customer_reviews.title: A great phone.
customer_reviews.text: Phone was perfect. Brand new sealed box. Great phone, if a touch expensive. Delivery was spot on too. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: R. Styles

customer_reviews.title: Wow, it’s just WOW!
customer_reviews.text: Literally wow, I’m very impressed by it. I used to hate notches on phones but when I bought the iPhone X, it changed my opinion right in the first second of booting it. I just can’t get enough of this phone, it’s amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Petcu

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I love it still lots to learn especially with the extra updates
customer_reviews.author: shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: iPhone x
customer_reviews.text: Received the iPhone X 6 days ago already had to replace the charger and had nothing but problems internally as well as with the screen. A trip to apple is a must.
customer_reviews.author: Neicey ACR

customer_reviews.title: X/cellent
customer_reviews.text: Love the screen, reliable iPhone build quality, charge it with a wireless charger and it’s a winner

customer_reviews.title: There are phones & iPhone
customer_reviews.text: It’s an iPhone , what else you need to read :)

customer_reviews.title: Buy now from this company
customer_reviews.text: Thank you, great company, had problem with charger, sorted the next day
customer_reviews.author: daniel snape

customer_reviews.title: Its a good phone but i received defective one.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this phone thinking it was a good deal and a great phone, instead i received the defective one. The phone was returned and refund issued, i would say i find the return process easy and hassle free but it took longer than i thought.. err thats okay but killed my time!
customer_reviews.author: Ajay

customer_reviews.title: Great phone and value for money
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Value for money. The vendor delivered it on time and its great
customer_reviews.author: Cal

customer_reviews.title: Brand new phone at used price
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from an 8plus, enjoying the one-handed operation. My concernes about Face ID over the previous fingerprint scan were unfounded, I adapted quickly. Otherwise the quality of phone is as you would expect from Apple
customer_reviews.author: malcolm j.

customer_reviews.title: Good phone
customer_reviews.text: Had the phone for 5 months so far, everything works as expected

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and brand new phone. Really pleased with it.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item delivered
customer_reviews.text: Received two phillips light bulbs instead of phone, not impressed...

customer_reviews.title: Delivered on time
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Very quick to arrive, easy to setup and great colour. 64GB gives plenty of storage space for my needs and the wireless charging makes it easy to leave on my desk whilst at work.

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Second time I have purchased this Model. Very smooth and easy to use. Best phone on the market in my opinion.

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, just wish IOS didnt make you dependent!
customer_reviews.text: I was previoulsy using and Iphone X as my company phone and got all the data for the past x years in a cloud. There was no option to retrieve those data in a phone different than an iphone!

customer_reviews.title: Hreat
customer_reviews.text: All great. Having littlenissue with sim recognition few days in but going to try a new sim card. Phone works great though

customer_reviews.title: Love iPhone, bit too pricy
customer_reviews.text: Great iPhone, not learned all features yet, should last a few years

customer_reviews.text: upgraded from iphone 5 found it cheaper to pay upfront for phone and go SIM only

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It was a good buy as it still had warranty and good job as I needed to take it to the apple store for a repair/clean

customer_reviews.text: Good buy, exactly what I expected and it’s a brand new like I just went to the apple store

customer_reviews.title: Delighted
customer_reviews.text: Delighted with my new phone. Storage will never run out unlike my 5S.

customer_reviews.title: Loved the product
customer_reviews.text: The phone was in very good condition. I really like it

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 5months!
customer_reviews.text: Broke after 5months! Utter crap? Not even sure it is authentic!

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Brand new iphone an amazing product packed with all accessorie...
customer_reviews.author: Azam

customer_reviews.title: Very good phone
customer_reviews.text: Changed from android to iPhone and definitely a very positive change so far!
customer_reviews.author: Johan

customer_reviews.title: Set up and registration was very easy and I quickly transferred my data from my old ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in two days and was exactly as advertised a brand new boxed iPhone X. Set up and registration was very easy and I quickly transferred my data from my old phone. Got myself a screen protector and the cover I wanted in town and I'm 100% happy. A great bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon W Braid

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery life
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t even had the phone for two weeks and the battery goes flat very quickly, I have contacted the seller to return the phone and they will not respond. I have contacted Apple who told me that I have to contact the seller, and amazon told me I have to contact apple. It’s very unfortunate this has happened with me and I do not want to keep the phone. It’s best to buy straight from Apple.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: not the seller's fault but the phone battery caught fire. apple replaced it
customer_reviews.author: BAGMAN

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value, so stylish, love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Yes, it is pricey but it is an iPod, camera and photo album as well as phone all in one. Well, had to justify it to myself. But I do love it and it can do loads of clever stuff.....I keep discovering more...wow Do watch YouTube clips to work out how to save on using up data.....used loads at the start but now know how to turn off different modes and save data......a great learning tool too😊
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone! It is a good step up from the IPhone SE which I had before. The screen and battery life are much better, facial recognition works real well and the camera is great - I love the profile setting which blurs our the background. The new headphone jack is a bit annoying, you have to use the apple headphones or Bluetooth ones, and you can’t charge the phone at the same time as listening via the wired headphones as they use the same jack. It is expensive but overall I would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: K. Read

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I needed to upgrade my iPhone and found this iPhone X on Amazon at a reasonable price. So glad I ordered it. Brand new and boxed, fast delivery. So pleased with everything about the phone. Screen a good size without being too big. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: All good
customer_reviews.text: I hate Iphones, but my mum loves them. Bought this for her arrived within 3 days to replace my mum's broken phone. She loves it and has been continually thanking me since 20th Dec 2018. So great seller and good product (still not worth the money IMO).
customer_reviews.author: Sam Coker

customer_reviews.title: best phone ever
customer_reviews.text: this is just fantastic it is so good its unreal my mac book is now redundant this does it all and so fast good price now forget the xs normal no point upgrade this phone is good for a few years yet cant fault it.love apple
customer_reviews.author: bazza

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: With phones becoming bigger and bigger, this is a great size for me. I ordered this off Amazon when the silver was discounted, so it was great value for money. Arrived very quickly with no issues.

customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this phone , it is an original Iphone X arrived on the next day , in perfect condition I recommend

customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I’d hoped, bst iPhone I’ve had and would never go elsewhere!

customer_reviews.text: What can I say that hasn't been said before, it's an Apple phone

customer_reviews.text: This was bought as a gift. After a few teething problems it is now favourite.

customer_reviews.title: great service from the seller
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, great service from the seller. Dispatched straight away and arrived the next day. The phone came just as described (purchased second hand) works perfectly, couldn't be happier. My previous phone was an iPhone 6, compared to the Iphone X is like night and day. Especially when playing games or apps that demand a high processing power. Awesome phone.

product_meta.title: Apple iPhone X (64GB) - Space Grey
feature_bullets: IP67 water and dust resistant (maximum depth of 1 meter up to 30 minutes)
12MP dual cameras with dual OIS and 7MP TrueDepth front camera—Portrait mode and Portrait Lighting
Face ID for secure authentication and Apple Pay
Wireless charging — works with Qi chargers
iOS 12 with Memoji, Screen Time, Siri Shortcuts and Group FaceTime
